job_detail.textContent:
Key Responsibilities

  • Create architecture and technical design for mobile solutions using design patterns and common solutions.
  • Work with cross-functional team including designers, information architects, backend developers to create optimum integration solutions.
  • Write scalable and maintainable code solutions for complex engineering challenges.
  • Understand and follow standards, guidelines, and best practices adopted in the project.
  • Appreciate & Develop high quality Front End/UI patterns for mobile devices.
  • Keep abreast of technology trends and advances in web / mobile technologies.

Essential Skills

  • Proficient in native iOS development (Objective-C)
  • Excellent working knowledge of Xcode5
  • Experience with Cocoa Touch frameworks and mobile user interface design
  • Experience with Core Data, Push Notifications, In-App Purchase, and Game Center
  • Strong understanding of mobile UI guidelines and best practices
  • Strong skills in object oriented programming and software design
  • Experience with database management systems
  • Experience developing and distributing applications via enterprise channels or public app stores
  • Excellent knowledge of working with dynamic data (e.g., JSON, XML, AMF) through various interface types (e.g., REST, SOAP)

Preferred Skills

  • Experience integrating analytics and tracking solutions (e.g., Omniture, Google Analytics) a plus
  • Experience integrating with CMS technologies (e.g., CQ5, Interwoven, CloudMine, Parse) a plus
  • Experience with PhoneGap, Titanium, Xamarin, Kony or any other cross-platform framework or mobile technology will be a big plus
